name: Kraljevina
description:
A fast-paced tactical RPG where a fisherman from a small town joins forces with the god who created his kind in order to defeat the darkness that menaces to destroy everything. The darkness stretches back into the heart of the human towns, menacing even the great capital! Will you be able to destroy it so it never comes back?

Features:

  •     Rich back story dating back to the first days of this world! It can help you comprehend more about the past, present and future of the current timeline of this world!
  • Action-packed side-view battles mechanics that goes from simple to very intricate, without having to feel boring or grindy!
  • Be careful with those chests! There is a reason why are there only in caves! However, if you open one you might find a unique threasure... or your own demise.
  • One of the best boss battles for RPGs of this size!
